channel.title: Dvd Burning ..?
channel.description:
Well I Downloaded some dvd rips of movies..and was wondering how do I burn them so i can watch them on dvd(Good quality)
Anyone got any really good tutorials on what program to use,how to...cd required?Dvd-R?
Please and thanks.

item.title: Dvd Burning ..?
item.dc:creator: @wolfpack81 wolfpack81
item.description:
@wolfpack81 wrote:

First you got to get DVDSanta. Look for a cracked version on http://ddl2.com/. Then you got to click convert video file to dvd. Add the file there then when thats done it should come up with something asking if you would like to burn it now. if it doesn’t click disk image/dvd folder to dvd. then burn and your done.

Read full topic

item.title: Dvd Burning ..?

item.description:
@1_dum_taco wrote:

uhh Buy a blank DVD Disk,put it in comp and shouldent it come up with windows media player(or w/e u have) and you would just have to load the file onto Windows Media and import it(at top right of screen).

item.title: Dvd Burning ..?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“1 dum taco, post:3, topic:62241”]Are you talking about putting them onto an ipod or a dvd…

I have a DVR thing that allows you to put stuff onto a DVd,if thats what u mean.[/quote]

Either way he needs a DVD R/RW drive to burn dvds. He can’t just burn a film to a normal CD/DVD using a CD R/RW drive.

Read full topic

item.title: Dvd Burning ..?

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“frost21, post:1, topic:62241”]Well I Downloaded some dvd rips of movies…and was wondering how do I burn them so i can watch them on dvd(Good quality)

Anyone got any really good tutorials on what program to use,how to…cd required?Dvd-R?

Please and thanks.[/quote]
